```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# Path
rsc_dir <- "/scratch/data/aiqc/merged/nrt_bo"
#rsc_dir <- "./resources"

# Variables
var <- "pres"
qc_var <- "pres_qc"
qc_var_name <- "Pressure QC flag"

# Data frame
bo_file_name <- file.path(rsc_dir, "netcdf_nrt_bo.parquet")

```

The page shows the basic analysis of `r tolower(qc_var_name)` QC flags from `r source`.

```{r, basic_info, results = 'asis'}
cat(res, sep = '\n')
```
